channel.title: Getting Started on Mattermost Developers
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Mattermost Developers

item.title: How Should I Integrate?
item.description: Very good question! Mattermost has many different integration points and this page will help you pick the right one(s) for the job. I just want to post into Mattermost If you only want to post messages into a Mattermost channel, then all you need is an incoming webhook. I want to know when someone says something Tracking what gets posted into a channel and receiving real-time events about it can be done using outgoing webhooks.
